channel.title: No Response from Server! :S
channel.description: I am sometimes having problems with people logging in it says, no response from server. Is there a way of fixing this so people can log on all the time with no problems. I am using PI 508 loader. Hybrid PVP

item.title: No Response from Server! :S
item.dc:creator: @sir_henry1 sir henry1
item.description:
@sir_henry1 wrote:

This is not fixable, tell the people not to try to log in for 3 minutes and when the 3 mins are up they will be able to log in

Read full topic
